Agendas & Minutes
=================



|  |
| --- |
| 275301430_328246766000054_7415076990308785116_n |
|  |
| **JOIN US FOR OUR REGULARLY SCHEDULED MEETINGS** It's important to keep a channel of communication between departments within the City of Edinburg and with our residents through regularly scheduled meetings. Council meetings are held every first and third Tuesday of the month. Browse the Agendease website in order to view documents used at the board meetings across departments within The City of Edinburg. Documents for different dates can be viewed or downloaded on this site.   |  |  |  | | --- | --- | --- | | [button_view-meeting-documents](https://cityofedinburg.com/government/agendas_and_minutes/city_council_agendas.php) |  |  | |

---

|  |  |  |
| --- | --- | --- |
| **CITY COUNCIL VIDEOS** Browse through the archives of City Council meeting documents and recordings by clicking the blue button.   [button_view-city-council-videos-and-documents](https://cityofedinburg.com/departments/public_information/live_ecn_1300_television_stream.php) |  |  |
|  |  |  |
| ![_HomePage](https://cityofedinburg.com/articles%20and%20events/_HomePage.jpg?t=202203291208300) |  | **BOARD MEETING RECORDINGS AND DOCUMENTS**In order to watch other meeting recordings and documents held by other boards in Edinburg, visit the links below.  [Edinburg2040](https://edinburg2040.com/) [EDC Board](https://edinburgedc.com/resources/) [Planning and Zoning Commission](https://cityofedinburg.com/departments/planning_and_zoning/planning_and_zoning_commission.php) [Tax Increment Reinvestment Zone III](https://cityofedinburg.com/government/agendas_and_minutes/edinburg_edc_boardedc_board_and_nbsp.php) [Zoning Board of Adjustments](https://cityofedinburg.com/departments/planning_and_zoning/zoning_board_of_adjustments.php) |
